title: Caring for Your Dog
description: In Caring for Your Dog, students will learn some things to consider before adding a new dog to the family. They will also learn about the things dogs need to be happy and healthy. High-frequency words, repetitive phrases, and detailed photographs support readers as they locate details that support the main idea as well as connect to prior knowledge.
meta: brushed, care, family, fed, needs, spend, treats, twice, washed
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Declarative Sentences : Recognize and use declarative sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word your

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
